metadata.name: Uncommon Child Processes Of SndVol.exe
metadata.comment: Detects potentially uncommon child processes of SndVol.exe (the Windows volume mixer)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\sndvol.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' shell32.dll,control_rundll '))))

output.summary: Detects potentially uncommon child processes of SndVol.exe (the Windows volume mixer)
